name: Search of self
description:
Waking up in a place you don´t know, lost memories and feeling unsafe. Better leave that place.

This world is dangerous, danger everywhere. Are you ready to take that risk?

Controls:

Move: W,A,S,D

Move faster: Shift

During battles : left mouse =normal shoot

right mouse= extra bullets

Space = heal

Pressing mouse scroll = Shoots special bullets
